Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
networking.SocketConnection
server.ClientHandler
public class ClientHandler extends SocketConnection
Handles communication with a single connected client. A ClientHandler is responsible for: - parsing protocol messages received from the client - delegating game-related actions to the GameServer - maintaining client-specific state such as username and opponent
